title: Muggsy Bogues | Ep. 135 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Muggsy Bogues | Ep. 135 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Legendary episode of ALL THE SMOKE is on tap as Matt and Stak are joined by the one and only Muggsy Bogues. The 14-year NBA vet opens up about his career, being shot when he was 5-years old, and shares crazy MJ stories. Plus, he talks about playing ACC basketball & current day hoops.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
